Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone,

While trying to fix up some wonky room connections I accidentally deleted one of the most important rooms in my game, and the undo button is not working. Is there any way to recover it? Also, I'm using the Web version.

For those of you coming from the other thread, the room I deleted is the one where you set out on your journey. It had a lot of if statements when leaving to the east, as there are a bunch of things it checks for. Like if you forget your map, you get lost and it's instant game over. If you've acquired a vehicle then you have different random encounters than going on foot, ect.

I'd really like to not have to re-do all that stuff.
